attributes.action: Stop paying MPs wages after 31st October 2019 until Brexit has been resolved
attributes.background: After having over three years to resolve the issue it appears that the accepted normal is for MPs to continually bicker amongst each other as to resolve the pertinent issue of brexit. Implementation of the above may assist in a resolution

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
